articles.title: Kim Jong Il Elected Deputy to 12th SPA of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Elected Deputy to 12th SPA of DPRK
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Election Committee for the Election of Deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Monday released a report on the results of the election of a deputy to the SPA held at Constituency No. 333 on Mar. 8.
					According to the report, all the voters of Constituency No. 333 participated in the election and voted for Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il who is general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, reflecting the unanimous will and wishes of all the servicepersons of the KPA and the people of the country.
					
					This is the expression of all servicepersons and people's absolute support and profound trust in
						Kim Jong Il.
					
					All the voters of Constituency No. 333 renewed their unshakable determination to devotedly safeguard Kim Jong Il, firmly defend the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses, the best in the world, and surely accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					The Central Election Committee reported that Kim Jong Il was elected deputy to the SPA on the basis of the results of voting confirmed and submitted by the election committee of Constituency No. 333.

articles.title: Returns of SPA Election Announced
articles.content:
Returns of SPA Election Announced
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Election Committee announced the returns of the election of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK on Monday.
					According to its report, the election of deputies to the SPA was successfully held on Sunday in accordance with the law on the election of deputies to people's assemblies at all levels.
					
					The election returns available showed that 99.98 percent of all the voters registered across the country participated in the balloting and 100 percent of the participants voted for the candidates for deputies to the SPA registered in their constituencies.
					
					Voters staying abroad or working in oceans were absent in the election.
					
					The Central Election Committee examined the reports on election returns submitted by the constituency committees across the country and announced the list of 686 persons elected as SPA deputies.

articles.title: KPA Supreme Command Orders All Its Servicepersons to Be Fully Combat Ready
articles.content:
KPA Supreme Command Orders All Its Servicepersons to Be Fully Combat Ready
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army released the following report on Monday as regards the madcap Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for aggression kicked off by the gangster-like U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of the puppet military of south Korea:
					The joint military exercises to be staged from March 9 to 20 will reportedly involve more than 26,000 U.S. imperialist aggression troops present in south Korea and overseas and hundreds of thousands of troops including the army corps, fleet command and units as big as flying corps of the puppet army of south Korea, super-large nuclear-powered carrier George Washington and Stennis task force of the U.S. imperialist aggressor navy made up of four Aegis cruisers, seven destroyers and nuclear-powered subs.
					
					Prior to the exercises, the U.S. imperialists brought 12 F-16 fighter bombers and more than 400 air force personnel to the Suwon air force base in south Korea from their mainland earlier than scheduled and deployed dozens of overseas-based various type aircraft including fighter bombers, pursuit assault planes, electronic jamming planes and refueling tankers in the Osan and Kunsan air force bases.
					
					B-52Hs, B-2As and F-22As have been deployed on Guam and other places around the Korean Peninsula to be ready to promptly go into action.
					
					The U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of the south Korean puppet military more than doubled the period of the exercises as compared with that last year.
					
					The exercises are something unprecedented in the number of the aggressor forces involved and in their duration. They are extremely adventurous ones for attack operation as they are characterized by arms buildup, infiltration into the rear, ground attack, coastal landing and surprise attack operations in contingency on the Korean Peninsula. They are, at the same time, a test war and nuclear war exercises for mounting surprise preemptive attacks on the DPRK from the land, sea and air.
					
					A war will break out if the U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of the south Korean puppet military hurl the huge troops and sophisticated strike means to mount an attack on the DPRK while staging the above-said exercises.
					
					The madcap Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are extremely adventurous and dangerous military provocations which can be seen only on the eve of a war and an undisguised military threat to the DPRK and a sort of a declaration of a war.
					
					The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have grown stronger thanks to the Songun politics under the care of the great illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu. They will never remain a passive on-looker to the prevailing situation now that dark clouds of war are gathering to hang over the homeland and armed clashes are imminent.
					
					The KPA Supreme Command issued an order to all the servicepersons to be fully combat ready and follow every move of the aggressors with vigilance in view of the grave situation prevailing in the country and deal merciless retaliatory blows at them, should they intrude into the sky and land and seas of the DPRK even an inch.
					
					This is a just measure for self-defence for protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and Korean-style socialism as firm as an iron wall and a resolute stand and firm will of the strong revolutionary armed forces of Mt. Paektu to cope with the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers to start a new war.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK love peace and do not want confrontation and war.
					
					Whenever the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities staged joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK, it drew their attention to their danger and served them warnings enough to help them understand it, repeatedly urging them to stop their reckless preparations for a war. 
					
					They, however, responded to our sincerity by blatant challenge and finally started the said madcap exercises aimed at launching the second Korean war.
					
					All facts go to clearly prove that "stability" and "peace" on the Korean Peninsula touted by the U.S. imperialists are nothing but sophism and they are war maniacs seeking the escalated tension and war only and the arch criminals prodding the north and the south into armed conflicts.
					
					This clearly proves once again that the pro-U.S. conservative group and warmongers of the puppet military of south Korea are a group of traitors seized with confrontation and war hysteria, staking their fate on outsiders in utter disregard of reconciliation and unity among Koreans, peace and reunification.
					
					War maniacs should be dealt with arms, not with words.
					
					Upon receiving the order of the KPA Supreme Command all the servicepersons of the KPA are fully determined to throw overboard the rubbish of history by fully displaying the inexhaustible mental power of the strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and the might of the powerful arms built up under the Songun leadership.
					
					There is no limit to the retaliatory measure of the KPA and no one can predict or evade it.
					
					If the warmongers dare launch a war of aggression defying our repeated warnings, our revolutionary armed forces will counter it with resolute and merciless just war for reunification.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group and U.S. and Japanese Aggressors Urged to Act with Discretion
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group and U.S. and Japanese Aggressors Urged to Act with Discretion
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army Monday issued the following statement in connection with the fact that the bellicose group of traitor Lee Myung Bak has embarked upon starting the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint war exercises against the DPRK in collusion with the U.S. imperialists at last despite the repeated warnings of the KPA:
					Carrier task force, strategic bomber corps and other huge armed forces of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces have already been deployed in south Korea and its vicinity and the armed forces of the three services of the puppet army have already started the exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					These war exercises were kicked off at a time when the U.S. and Japanese aggressors and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, not content with claiming that the DPRK should "dismantle its nuclear weapons first," have mobilized huge ground and coastal interceptor means in a bid to prevent the DPRK from launching a satellite for peaceful purposes. 
					
					In view of the prevailing grave situation the General Staff of the KPA solemnly declares as follows in order to protect the supreme interests of the country and the nation from the war maniacs' reckless moves for aggression against the DPRK:
					
					1. Our revolutionary armed forces will counter the enemies' any slight hostile acts of violating the sovereignty of the country and intruding into its inviolable territory, territorial waters and territorial air with prompt merciless military actions.
					
					It is the invariable stand of our revolutionary armed forces fully ready for all-out confrontation not to allow any enemies to intrude into our territory, territorial waters and territorial air even 0.001 mm.
					
					2. We will retaliate any act of intercepting our satellite for peaceful purposes with prompt counter strikes by the most powerful military means.
					
					If the enemies recklessly opt for intercepting our satellite, our revolutionary armed forces will launch without hesitation a just retaliatory strike operation not only against all the interceptor means involved but against the strongholds of the U.S. and Japanese aggressors and the south Korean puppets who hatched plots to intercept it. 
					
					Shooting our satellite for peaceful purposes will precisely mean a war. 
					
					3. As an immediate measure we will enforce a more strict military control and cut off the north-south military communications in order to guarantee the security in the opened Eastern and Western coastal areas under the control of the north and the south while the DPRK-targeted war exercises are under way.
					
					It is nonsensical to maintain normal communications channel at a time when the south Korean puppets are getting frantic with the above-said war exercises, leveling guns at fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces.
					
					Accordingly, our army will cut off the military communications, the last channel which has existed between the north and the south, from March 9.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and the U.S. and Japanese aggressors would be well advised to behave with discretion.

articles.title: Greetings to Ghanaian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ghanaian President
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Mar. 3 sent a message of greetings to John Evans Atta Mills, President of Ghana, on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of its independence.
					Expressing belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Ghana would develop in the future, too, Kim in the message wished the Ghanaian president big success in his noble work for the national unity and the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: True Feature of Single-minded Unity Glanced through Elections
articles.content:
True Feature of Single-minded Unity Glanced through Elections
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The true feature of the single-minded unity of the Korean army and people united around the leader had been displayed to the world once again in the period from January 6 on which the decision of holding elections of deputies to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was announced to March 8, the election day.
					Upon receipt of the news about the elections, the whole Party, the entire army and all the people have been striving to effect a giant leap forward on all fronts for building a great, prosperous and powerful nation, under the uplifted torch of a new great revolutionary upsurge.
					
					Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il was nominated as a candidate for deputy to the 12th Supreme People's Assembly at the voters' meeting of Constituency No. 333 on February 1 in reflection of the unanimous desire of the officers and men of the KPA.
					
					It was followed by similar meetings of all the constituencies throughout the country.
					
					This was a vivid expression of the invariable faith and revolutionary will of the Korean army and people to have Kim Jong Il at the highest post of the Korean revolution and glorify the country.
					
					In his open letter sent to all voters throughout the country on February 17, General Secretary
						Kim Jong Il extended his heartfelt thanks to the entire electorate of the country for their deep trust in him and manifested his strong will to be always among the servicepersons and people and devote his all to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people, true to President Kim Il Sung's noble intention.
					
					 In response to the open letter, all the voters held rallies and made their minds to repay his deep trust in them.
					
					They participated in the elections of deputies to the SPA as one on March 8 and thus consolidated the people's power as firm as rock and demonstrated the durability of the single-minded unity rallied close around the leader with one mind and one will and the invincibility of the Korean-style socialist system.

articles.title: Women's Day Observed in Blessing
articles.content:
Women's Day Observed in Blessing
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The International Women's Day (March 8) is a significant day which brings pride and happiness, pleasure and glory to the Korean women pushing vigorously one of the wheels of revolution.
					This year's women's day was more auspicious, coupled with the elections of deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					The attention of the people was focused on the women deputies and local mass media concentrated on carrying or telecasting special write-ups, various forms of articles, films, items introducing women and songs on the themes of the women's position and role in various fields of the family and social life.
					
					Men did not spare their efforts to delight the women more than usual in families and working sites.
					
					Men greeted the women with the words "I congratulate you on the International Women's Day."
					
					The female teachers of the kindergartens, primary schools, middle schools, universities and other educational institutions were presented a great many bouquets by their students.
					
					The flower and cosmetics shops were crowded with men to buy gifts for women.
					
					Women of the capital spent a pleasant while, taking Pyongyang cold noodle in restaurants.

articles.title: Triplets Born
articles.content:
Triplets Born
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Triplets were born at the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital Sunday.
					Kim Myong Ae gave birth to the triplets (one daughter and two sons). She is residing in Sinuiju City, North Phyongan Province.
					
					Since she was admitted to the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital on January 11, she has kept herself in good health thanks to the warm solicitude shown by the Party and the state for the women who gave birth to several babies and medical workers' particular care. 
					
					A competent medical group was formed to take a series of measures for treating her. She has been offered wild honey and other tonics and nutrients.
					
					The triplets are now in good health, each weighing 2.34 kg, 2.44 kg and 2.38 kg.

articles.title: War Exercises against DPRK Labeled Unpardonable Treachery
articles.content:
War Exercises against DPRK Labeled Unpardonable Treachery
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The large-scale joint military exercises against fellow countrymen staged by the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea together with foreign forces can never be tolerated in the least as they are a treacherous crime of going against the trend of the times toward independent reunification, peace and prosperity, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed article.
					Citing facts to prove that since it took office, talking about the "lost decade", the Lee Myung Bak group has been strengthening the collusion with foreign forces seeking to ignite a war of aggression on the DPRK while vociferating about the "strengthened alliance" with the U.S., the article notes:
					
					The adventurous scheme of the Lee group to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK is clearly evidenced by its joint military exercises with the U.S. being staged nonstop in south Korea.
					
					The touch-and-go situation in which a nuclear war may break out any moment is prevailing in the Korean Peninsula and the destiny of the nation is exposed to threat owing to the reckless moves of the Lee Myung Bak bellicose group to provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. has long pursued its strategy for aggression on the DPRK in a bid to dominate the Korean Peninsula as a whole.
					
					To kowtow to such foreign aggression forces and cooperate with them in their moves for a war of aggression on the DPRK is a treacherous act of selling off the interests of the nation lock, stock and barrel and posing a serious threat to the life and security of all Koreans.
					
					The existence of the Lee group of traitors, who do not hesitate to betray their nation for the sake of the outsiders' interests, itself is a disgrace and disaster to the Korean nation.
					
					It is a foolish dream for the group to seek to do harm to the fellow countrymen by force of arms in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					The Lee group will certainly have to pay for such tremendous treacherous crime as getting frantic in war cooperation with foreign forces, contrary to the trend of the times toward national independence.

articles.title: The U.S. and Puppet Warmongers' DPRK-Targeted War Exercises Assailed
articles.content:
The U.S. and Puppet Warmongers' DPRK-Targeted War Exercises Assailed
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Should the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers perpetrate even a slight provocation in the sky, the land and seas, they will not escape resolute and merciless retaliatory blows, warns Minju Joson Monday in a signed commentary blasting them for kicking off the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises throughout south Korea today. 
					The entire land of south Korea has turned into a huge ground for war exercises and the danger of a military conflict is further increasing than ever before on the Korean Peninsula because of the saber rattling which involves armed forces huge enough to fight a war, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					The prevailing situation clearly indicates who is the arch criminal bringing the danger of a new war, a nuclear war, to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The commentary cites facts to prove that the claim of the U.S. and the puppet warmongers that the above-mentioned military exercises are "annual ones and ones for defense" is nothing but sophism intended to mislead the public opinion. 
					
					The on-going war maneuvers are aimed at invading the DPRK from A to Z, it holds, and goes on: 
					
					Now that there are no legal and institutional mechanisms for deterring any accidental case from developing into a war on the Korean Peninsula, even a slight accident that may occur in the course of the above-said war maneuvers may trigger off a new war, a nuclear war.
					
					It is as clear as a pikestaff that in that case the war is bound to spill over into the neighboring countries. However, the U.S. and the puppet warmongers started the nuclear war exercises targeted against the DPRK. This is an undisguised challenge to the Korean nation and the world peace-loving people. It is a serious provocation intended to seize the DPRK by force of arms and a deliberate criminal act of straining the situation in Northeast Asia.
					
					The U.S. and the puppets seek to pressurize and browbeat the servicepersons and people of the DPRK by force of arms by demonstrating "alliance" and "strength" through the above-said saber rattling and find a way out of the daily deepening internal and external crises. This is, however, a foolish daydream. It is the spirit of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to react to aggressors' provocation with a thousand-fold retaliation. 
					
					The U.S. and the Lee group had better bear this in mind and stop the war maneuvers, though belatedly, urges the commentary.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Hostile Policy toward Fellow Countrymen Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Hostile Policy toward Fellow Countrymen Flayed
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military in a "white paper on national defense" for 2008 issued recently claimed that the DPRK is posing a "direct and grave threat to south Korea."
					Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					This is obviously a replica of the phraseology "principal enemy," an ill-famed pronoun used for confrontation with fellow countrymen in the days of the former dictatorial regimes. 
					
					It clearly reveals the treacherous scenario of the Lee Myung Bak group to bring the inter-Korean relations back to those in the past era of confrontation and realize its ambition for "achieving unification through the invasion of the north" by armed forces at any cost while extremely antagonizing fellow countrymen. 
					
					The puppet bellicose elements have worked hard to stoke distrust and hostility toward the DPRK not only within the military but in different social circles while openly advocating the theory of "principal enemy" from the outset of the office of traitor Lee Myung Bak. This is an inevitable product of the traitor's policy of confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises to be kicked off by the puppet military across south Korea from Monday in league with foreign forces fully reveal the treacherous and hostile policy pursued by the Lee group toward fellow countrymen in a desperate bid to kill them by force of arms while regarding them not as members of the nation with whom reconciliation and unity should be achieved but as the "principal enemy."
					
					The DPRK will certainly force the Lee group to pay a dear price for the acts of treachery it has committed by adopting the anachronistic "theory of principal enemy" as its policy at the last and challenging the aspiration of the nation for independent reunification by starting the joint military exercises and punish the clique of traitors in the name of the nation without fail.
					
					If the Lee group dares mount a preemptive attack on fellow countrymen, obsessed by the wild ambition, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will deal merciless devastating retaliatory blows at the provocateurs and wipe out all the enemies of peace and reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Fascist Prosecution's Suppression Protested
articles.content:
S. Korean Fascist Prosecution's Suppression Protested
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- 35 human rights organizations and at least 100 human rights activists of south Korea released a joint statement on Mar. 5 denouncing the fascist prosecution for its unreasonable suppression.
					The statement accused the prosecution authorities of applying for an arrest warrant for Pak Rae Gun, co-executive chairman of the All-People Committee for Measures against Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan, on the charge of violation of the "law on assembly and demonstration."
					
					Through such action the Lee Myung Bak regime sought to push forward its "development policy" in real earnest and further increase the authority of the police, the statement said, and continued:
					
					The authorities that have regarded the activities of the said committee as a thorn in their flesh and intensified the suppression of it are cracking down on such figures as Pak Rae Gun by branding him as prime movers of "illegal rallies."
					
					Those who should be arrested by the prosecution are the ringleaders of the murder of Ryongsan evacuees including the former chief of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency, it charged, warning that in case an arrest warrant is issued for Pak Rae Gun, they will launch a strong protest against it.

articles.title: Struggle under Banner of "By Our Nation Itself" Declared
articles.content:
Struggle under Banner of "By Our Nation Itself" Declared
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification held a general meeting on Feb. 28 at which it declared that it would struggle against the anti-reunification moves of the conservative ruling forces under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself."
					A resolution read out at the meeting said that the inter-Korean relations are in the worst crisis entirely because the Lee Myung Bak regime totally denied the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and has desperately worked to realize its ambition for achieving "unification under the liberal democratic system."
					
					The achievements made since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration have been brought to naught due to the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who have advocated "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars," the resolution noted.
					
					It is impossible to implement the joint declarations and achieve the peace on the Korean Peninsula and the prosperity of the nation unless traitor Lee steps down, it said, adding that it is an urgent task at present to check the moves of the anti-reunification forces.
					
					It went on: We will put up in our van the slogan "Advance dynamically along the road of independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration!" and struggle against the anti-reunification moves of the conservative ruling forces in the idea of "By our nation itself."
					
					We will check and frustrate the Lee Myung Bak regime's reckless moves for a war of aggression against the north and for confrontation with fellow countrymen and fight against its fascist suppression of the pro-reunification patriotic forces.

articles.title: February 16 Celebrated in Guyana
articles.content:
February 16 Celebrated in Guyana
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a joint seminar on the Songun politics took place in Guyana on Feb. 28 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					Leader of the Good and Green Guyana Hamilton Green said at the meeting that the Korean people have achieved great successes in the drive for building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					He noted that the Good Green Guyana fully supports the struggle of the Korean people for independent and peaceful reunification and will strive to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					Robert Williams, chairman of the Guyanese National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Comrade Kim Il Sung, noted in a speech that Kim Jong Il formulated President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary idea as an integral system of the Juche-based ideas, theories and methods and has pursued the unique Songun politics based on the Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by the President.
					
					Patric Daial, vice-chairman of the said committee, stressed in his speech that today the Juche idea, the Songun idea has fully demonstrated its validity and vitality on the international arena.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause Supported in UK
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause Supported in UK
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- We call upon all the adherents to the Juche idea, the Songun idea, and the progressive mankind valuing independence and justice to fully support the DPRK, the homeland of Juche and the fortress of socialism, and the Korean people's cause of justice at present time when the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers are working hard to stage war exercises for aggression on the DPRK.
					The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on Feb. 27 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers' joint military exercises, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					Expressing deep apprehension over the scheme of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities to stage such military exercises at a time when the situation of the Korean Peninsula is getting extremely strained due to their reckless anti-DPRK, anti-reunification policy, the statement strongly censured their madcap exercises. 
					
					Nobody can assure that the said war games will not lead to an actual war as they are to be staged when the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are letting loose a spate of belligerent remarks against the DPRK, said the statement.
					
					Reiterating the support to the statement issued by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, the joint statement expressed belief that the KPA and the Korean people would deal a merciless blow to the aggressors if they ignite a new war of aggression in Korea.
					
					The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain sent a letter to the chief executive of the U.S. on Feb. 28 in protest against the said joint military drills.
					
					The letter strongly urged the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean war-thirsty forces to immediately stop the joint military exercises and withdraw the U.S. troops from south Korea.

articles.title: Eligen a Kim Jong Il como diputado a la APS
articles.content:
Eligen a Kim Jong Il como diputado a la APS
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Comite Electoral Central para las elecciones de los diputados a la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio a conocer el dia 9 el resultado de las elecciones del diputado a la APS del distrito electoral No.333 efectuadas la vispera.
					Segun documento, todos los electores del distrito electoral No. 333  participaron como un solo hombre en el sufragio y votaron el 100 por ciento a favor del  Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, en reflejo de la unanime voluntad y deseo de los oficiales y soldados del EPC y otros habitantes de todo el pais.
					
					Esto es una prueba del absoluto apoyo e infinita confianza de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el pueblo en el Dirigente.
					
					Todos los electores del distrito electoral No. 333 tomaron su firme determinacion de defender a costa de la vida al Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il, proteger con firmeza el regimen socialista al estilo coreano, centrado en las masas populares, mas ventajoso en el mundo, y realizar, cueste lo que cueste, la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					 El Comite Electoral Central informo de que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue electo diputado a la APS segun el resultado de votacion confirmado y presentado por el Comite del distrito electoral No. 333.

articles.title: Informado resultado de elecciones de diputados a la APS
articles.content:
Informado resultado de elecciones de diputados a la APS
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Comite Electoral Central para las elecciones de los diputados a la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 9 una informacion sobre el resultado de las elecciones.
					Segun el documento, se efectuaron con exito las elecciones de los diputados a la XII Legislatura de la APS de la RPDC con arreglo a la ley  sobre las elecciones a los diputados a las asambleas populares a todos niveles. 
					
					Segun los datos de las elecciones, el 99.98% de los electores registrados en las listas de votantes en escala nacional participo en las elecciones y  el cien por ciento voto en pro de los candidatos a los diputados a la APS registrados en los distritos electorales correspondientes.
					
					No pudieron participar en las elecciones los electores que permanecen en el extranjero o trabajan en alta mar.
					
					El CEC examino los informes sobre el resultado de elecciones presentado por los comites electorales distritales de todo el pais y dio a conocer los nombres de los 686 diputados electos.

articles.title: Informacion de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC
articles.content:
Informacion de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que los bandidescos imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas del circulo militar titere del Sur de Corea libran demencialmente el agresivo ejercicio militar conjunto "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho", la Comandancia Suprema del Ejercito Popular de Corea publico el dia 9 la siguiente informacion:
					Se trascendio que en este frenetico entrenamiento militar conjunto, que se desarrollara del dia 9 al 20, participaran mas de 26 mil uniformados agresores norteamericanos estacionados en el Sur de Corea y en ultramar y cientos de miles de efectivos del ejercito titere surcoreano incluyendo las comandancias de cuerpos y flotas y las unidades a nivel de aviacion. A estas fuerzas armadas, se suman los colectivos de ataque al mando de los portaaviones supergrandes de propulsion nuclear "George Washinton" y "Stennis" de la fuerza naval norteamericana, compuestos por 4 cruceros Aegis y 7 destructores y submarinos nucleares.
					
					Con anterioridad, el imperialismo norteamericano traslado, antes de la fecha planeada, del territorio estadounidense a la base aerea en Suwon del Sur de Corea 12 cazabombarderos "F-16" y mas de 400 efectivos de la fuerza aerea.
					
					Ademas, desplego en las bases aereas en Osan y Kunsan decenas de aviones de diversas misiones procedentes de las bases en ultramar, entre otras, cazabombardero, avion de asalto, avion para la radioperturbacion y el nodriza.
					
					Ubico en la isla Guam y el contorno de la Peninsula Coreana los bombarderos estrategicos "B-52H" y "B-2A" y los ultramodernos cazabombarderos "F-22A", que entraron en el acto en la disposicion para movilizarse en el combate.
					
					El imperialismo norteamericano y los belicistas del circulo militar titere del Sur de Corea alargaron mas de dos veces el plazo del presente ejercicio militar conjunto en comparacion con el ano pasado.
					
					Este ejercicio sin precedentes en la historia tanto a la vista del numero de las fuerzas armadas agresoras como a la luz de su periodo es el entrenamiento penetrado de las sumamente aventureras operaciones de ataque como el aumento armamentista, la infiltracion en la retaguardia, la ofensiva terrestre, el desembarco, y el asalto intensivo en el tiempo de emergencia de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Igualmente, deviene el ensayo de guerra y el ejercicio de guerra nuclear para atacar a la RPDC de manera sorpresiva y preventiva en la tierra, el mar y el cielo.
					
					Si los imperialistas norteamericanos y los belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano lanzan al ataque a las colosales fuerzas armadas y medios ofensivos de punta movilizados en ese ejercicio ordenandoles el cambio de rumbo, esto sera precisamente la guerra.
					
					El frenetico ejercicio militar conjunto "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" es la provocacion militar extremadamente aventurera y peligrosa visible solo en visperas de guerra y la abierta amenaza militar y una serie de declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					En estos momentos en que sopla el fuerte viento con olor a la guerra en la tierra patria y esta a punto de relampaguear las rafagas de enfrentamiento, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias consolidadas mil veces en virtud del Songun (priorizacion militar) en el regazo del gran General Insigne del Paektu no estaran jamas con brazos cruzados ante la situacion dada.
					
					Frente a la grave situacion creada en el pais, la Comandancia Suprema del EPC ordeno a todos sus oficiales y soldados que vigilen agudamente cada movimiento de los agresores manteniendo la perfecta disposicion de combate y pasen al castigo implacable si se da algun minimo sintoma de provocacion en el cielo, la tierra y el mar de la RPDC.
					
					Esto es la justa medida de autodefensa para defender la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion y salvaguardar de modo inexpugnable el socialismo al estilo coreano. Igualmente, constituye la rotunda posicion y ferrea voluntad del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu en cuanto a las maniobras de EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos para provocar la nueva guerra.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea aman la paz y no desean la confrontacion y la guerra.
					
					Hasta la fecha, cada vez que EE.UU. y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas libraban los ejercicios militares conjuntos contra la RPDC, esta les demando reiteradamente el cese de esta aventurera preparacion de guerra llamandoles la atencion y haciendoles advertencias en la medida suficiente.
					
					Pero, EE.UU. y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas desafiaron totalmente a todos los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC y se enfrascan demencialmente en los ejercicios de la segunda guerra de agresion contra esta iniciando finalmente el ejercicio militar conjunto "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho".
					
					Estos hechos muestran que la "estabilidad" y la "paz" de la Peninsula Coreana, de que habla EE.UU., son un sofisma y este imperio es el maniaco belicista, que persigue solo la agravacion de la tension y la guerra, y es el responsable principal que fomenta el conflicto armado entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Tambien vuelven a comprobar bien claro que el grupo de conservadores proyanquis y los belicistas del ejercito titere del Sur de Corea son la horda de traidores a la nacion que andan fanaticos por la confrontacion y la guerra manteniendo su vida apoyandose en las fuerzas extranjeras, lejos de la reconciliacion y la unidad entre los connacionales y de la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					Hay que tratar a los maniacos de guerra no con palabras sino con fusiles.
					
					Todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC, que recibieron la orden de su Comandancia Suprema, estan llenos de la decision de vida o muerte de aniquilar a las basuras de la historia empleando la ilimitada potencia espiritual del potente ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu y la capacidad de las poderosas fuerzas armadas consolidadas en virtud del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					 La contramedida del EPC es ilimitada, imprevisible e imposible de esquivar.
					
					Si los belicistas se atreven a imponer la guerra de agresion a pesar de las reiteradas advertencias de la RPDC, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias les responderan con la rotunda, implacable y justiciera guerra por la reunificacion.

articles.title: EMG del EPC advierte a EE.UU. y Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
EMG del EPC advierte a EE.UU. y Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que pese a las repetidas advertencias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la horda de los belicistas del traidor Lee Myung Bak, en contubernio con los imperialistas norteamericanos, emprendio al fin y al cabo el camino para el ejercicio conjunto militar "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" contra la RPDC, el portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 9 la siguiente declaracion.
					Las colosales fuerzas armadas de las tropas agresoras de Estados Unidos inclusive el grupo de ataque de portaaviones y la aviacion de bombarderos estrategicos terminaron el despliegue movil en el Sur de Corea y sus contornos y las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas titeres ya entraron en estado de ejercicio de guerra de agresion al Norte.
					
					Sobre todo, el presente entrenamiento belico se desarrolla en estado de que los agresores norteamericanos y japoneses y la horda del traidor Lee, al cabo de haber hablado tanto de la "renuncia nuclear, primero", movilizaron hasta numerosos medios terrestres y navales de intercepcion para detener el lanzamiento del satelite con fines pacificos de la RPDC.
					
					Frente a la grave situacion dada, para defender el interes supremo del pais y la nacion desde las imprudentes maniobras de agresion al Norte de los maniacos de la guerra, el Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea declara con solemnidad como sigue:
					
					Primero, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC tomaran la inmediata e implacable accion militar contra el minimo acto hostil de los enemigos que invaden la soberania del pais, el sagrado territorio, el mar y el cielo territoriales.
					
					No permitir la agresion a 0.001 mm de nuestro territorio, mar y cielo es la invariable posicion de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias que estan en estado de confrontacion total.
					
					Segundo, respondera con el contraataque inmediato segun los mas poderosos medios militares con respecto al acto de interceptacion contra nuestro satelite con fines pacificos.
					
					Si los enemigos, al perder el juicio, pasan al acto de interceptacion contra nuestro satelite, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias iniciaran sin vacilacion el golpe de represalia justa no solo contra todos los medios interceptores movilizados sino tambien contra las sedes principales de los invasores norteamericanos y japoneses y los titeres surcoreanos que tramaron el complot de interceptacion.
					
					La interceptacion contra nuestro satelite con fines pacificos significa precisamente la guerra.
					
					Tercero, de inmediato, durante el periodo de los ejercicios de guerra de agresion al Norte, la RPDC realizara el control militar mas riguroso para garantizar la seguridad de las areas de administracion Norte-Sur de las zonas oriental y occidental que estan abiertas e interrumpira tambien la comunicacion militar Norte-Sur.
					
					Sera ridiculo el mantenimiento de tal comunicacion cuando la parte Sur se enfrasca en el ejercicio belico de agresion al Norte apuntando el fusil a los connacionales en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					Por lo tanto, nuestro ejercito interrumpira desde el 9 de marzo la comunicacion militar, ultima via que ha existido unicamente entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.  
					
					La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak y los agresores norteamericanos y japoneses deberan actuar con prudencia.
